maml:description.maml:para: Executes dbo.sp_Blitz and returns results.
Executes dbo.sp_Blitz and returns results. Result returned will depend on the parameters provided.
Specifies the debug level for stored procedure. Level 1 returns 1 message per step. Level 2 outputs dynamic queries.
Perform checks that may cause blocking.
Specifies to check databases beyond the first 50.
Show server information like SQL Server version, CPUs, memory, virtualization, etc.
Specifies database where sp_Blitz is located.
Ignore priorities above specified value.
Ignore priorities below specified value.
Specifies the SQL instance to execute sp_BlitzFirst stored procedure.
Skips the review user databases for triggers, heaps, untrusted foreign keys, etc. Takes more time for more databases and objects.
Return one row per distinct FindingsGroup and Finding and Priority.
Specifies the user principal to check for database owner.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

Specifies to check databases beyond the first 50.
Returns the top 20-50 resource-intensive cache plans and analyze them for common performance issues. It looks for missing indexes, implicit datatype conversions, user-defined functions, and more.
Specifies the analysis to focus on.
Show server information like SQL Server version, CPUs, memory, virtualization, etc.
Specifies database where sp_Blitz is located.
Ignore priorities above specified value.
Ignore priorities below specified value.
Returns the top 20-50 resource-intensive plans even if they did not trigger an alarm.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database. This will return the default output of the stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection. This will return the default output of stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @Help parameter set to 1. This will return the help information from stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @VersionCheckMode parameter set to 1. This will return the version information from stored procedure.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 5 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -SkipChecksDatabase Admin -SkipChecksSchema dbo -SkipChecksTable Blitz_SkipChecks

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database skipping steps matched in table Admin.dbo.Blitz_SkipChecks.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database. The output will include procedure cache information.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 7 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName Blitz

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database and stores the results in dbo.Blitz table.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 8 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -SkipChecksDatabase Admin -SkipChecksSchema dbo -SkipChecksTable Blitz_SkipChecks -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName Blitz

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database, skips checks in table dbo.,Blitz_SkipChecks and stores the results in dbo.Blitz table.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @Help parameter set to 1. This will return the help information from stored procedure.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @VersionCheckMode parameter set to 1. This will return the version information from stored procedure.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 11 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -SqlConnection $MyConnection -SkipChecksDatabase Admin -SkipChecksSchema dbo -SkipChecksTable Blitz_SkipChecks

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection skipping steps matched in table Admin.dbo.Blitz_SkipChecks.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection. The output will include procedure cache information.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 13 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -SqlConnection $MyConnection -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName Blitz

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection and stores the results in dbo.Blitz table.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 14 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-Blitz -SqlConnection $MyConnection -SkipChecksDatabase Admin -SkipChecksSchema dbo -SkipChecksTable Blitz_SkipChecks -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName Blitz

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_Blitz using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection, skips checks in table dbo.,Blitz_SkipChecks and stores the results in dbo.Blitz table.

maml:description.maml:para: Executes dbo.sp_BlitzAnalysis and returns results.
Executes dbo.sp_BlitzAnalysis and returns results. Result returned will depend on the parameters provided.
Specifies the sort order for stored BlitzCache results.
Returns Blitz debug information from stored procedure.
Required when retrieving more than 4 hours of data with BlitzCacheSortOrder set to all.
Specifies database where sp_BlitzAnalysis is located.
Filters results for BlitzCache, FileStats and BlitzWho result sets.
Specifies the datetime to end analysis.
Specifies the maximum BlitzFirst priority to include in the results.
Specifies the maximum degree of parallelism that the queries within the stored procedure can use.
Specify the database name where where the blitz data is stored.
Specifies the schema name where tables are that contains the Blitz information.
Specifies the table name where BlitzCache information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Specifies the table name where BlitzFirst information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Specifies the table name where BlitzWho information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Specifies the table name where FileStats information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Specifies the table name where PerfMonStats information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Specifies the table name where WaitStats information is stored. Set parameter to null to skip.
Sets the threshold in milliseconds to compare against io_stall_read_average_ms for the stored FileStats.
Specifies the SQL instance to execute sp_BlitzAnalysis stored procedure.
Specifies the server name to folder results.
Specifies the datetime to start analysis.
Specifies the number of top wait stats.
Sets the threshold in milliseconds to compare against io_stall_write_average_ms for the stored FileStats.
Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs. The cmdlet is not run.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database. This will return the default output of the stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection. This will return the default output of stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @Help parameter set to 1. This will return the help information from stored procedure.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @VersionCheckMode parameter set to 1. This will return the version information from stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @OutputType parameter set to Top10. This will return the top 10 wait information.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @OutputType parameter set to Schema. This will return the table schema information.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @ExpertMode parameter set to 1. This will return extended Blitz first information, including session information, wait stats, file stats, and perfmon stats.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the @SinceStartup parameter set to 1. This will return wait stats, file stats, and perfmon stats.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 9 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -OutputTableNameFileStats BlitzFirst_FileStats -OutputTableNamePerfmonStats BlitzFirst_PerfmonStats -OutputTableNameWaitStats BlitzFirst_WaitStats -OutputTableNameBlitzCache BlitzCache -OutputTableNameBlitzWho BlitzWho

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the various output parameters specifying the database and table names to store results from stored procedure.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 10 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -AsOf '2024-07-08 16:57:02.6322342 -04:00' -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -OutputTableNameFileStats BlitzFirst_FileStats -OutputTableNamePerfmonStats BlitzFirst_PerfmonStats -OutputTableNameWaitStats BlitzFirst_WaitStats -OutputTableNameBlitzCache BlitzCache -OutputTableNameBlitzWho BlitzWho

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database to return the information previously stored from around the datetimeoffset provided.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 11 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst -ServerInstance . -DatabaseName Admin -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -LogMessageCheckID 69 -LogMessagePriority 1 -LogMessageFindingsGroup 'Log Message' -LogMessageFinding 'Message' -LogMessageURL http://www.domain.com -LogMessage 'Example Log Message Detail.' -LogMessageCheckDate $(Get-Date)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database to store log message into BlitzFirst table.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @Help parameter set to 1. This will return the help information from stored procedure.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @VersionCheckMode parameter set to 1. This will return the version information from stored procedure.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @OutputType parameter set to Top10. This will return the top 10 wait information.
Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @OutputType parameter set to Schema. This will return the table schema information.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @ExpertMode parameter set to 1. This will return extended Blitz first information, including session information, wait stats, file stats, and perfmon stats.

Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the @ExpertMode parameter set to 1. This will return wait stats, file stats, and perfmon stats.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 18 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst -SqlConnection $MyConnection -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -OutputTableNameFileStats BlitzFirst_FileStats -OutputTableNamePerfmonStats BlitzFirst_PerfmonStats -OutputTableNameWaitStats BlitzFirst_WaitStats -OutputTableNameBlitzCache BlitzCache -OutputTableNameBlitzWho BlitzWho

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection with the various output parameters specifying the database and table names to store results from stored procedure. Tables with appropriate schema must exist in the provided database.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 19 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst SqlConnection $MyConnection -AsOf '2024-07-08 16:57:02.6322342 -04:00' -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -OutputTableNameFileStats BlitzFirst_FileStats -OutputTableNamePerfmonStats BlitzFirst_PerfmonStats -OutputTableNameWaitStats BlitzFirst_WaitStats -OutputTableNameBlitzCache BlitzCache -OutputTableNameBlitzWho BlitzWho

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst using the the SqlConnection object in variable $MyConnection to return the information previously stored from around the datetimeoffset provided.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 20 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzFirst -ServerInstance . -DatabaseName Admin -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzFirst -LogMessageCheckID 69 -LogMessagePriority 1 -LogMessageFindingsGroup 'Log Message' -LogMessageFinding 'Message' -LogMessageURL http://www.domain.com -LogMessage 'Example Log Message Detail.' -LogMessageCheckDate $(Get-Date)

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzFirst on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database to store log message into BlitzFirst table.

command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Invoke-BlitzWho -ServerInstance MyServer -DatabaseName Admin -OutputDatabaseName Admin -OutputSchemaName dbo -OutputTableName BlitzWho

dev:remarks.maml:para: Executes stored procedure dbo.sp_BlitzWho on SQL instance MyServer in the Admin database with the stored procedure results are stored in the specified database and table.
